name: Life Leecher
description:
Life Leecher is a first person horror game where, you, a lumberjack get sucked underground after trying to cut down a grand tree. You must now escape the dirt maze before the monster drains you and your heart of moisture to fuel its self.

This game was developed at the 2023 Global Game Jam at Azusa Pacific University with the theme of Roots.

Zachary Gomez: Environmental Design and Lighting 

Braden Robins: Artist, Animator, Modeler 

Victoria Ortiz: Artists, Animator, Modeler 

Kendrick Haskins: Sound Editor and Composer   

Younghui Kang: Programmer 

Tanner Eckmann: Programmer
